meanings.definition: A person or organization that helps individuals recover from illness or addiction.
meanings.sent1: The rehabilitators at the clinic provided support to help the patients get better.
meanings.sent2: The rehabilitators at the rehab center assist people in overcoming their challenges.
meanings.sent3: The rehabilitators threw a party to celebrate the patients' progress.
meanings.sent4: The rehabilitators were like guardian angels guiding the individuals towards healing.
meanings.sent5: The caring attitude of the rehabilitators made the recovery journey easier for everyone.

meanings.definition: Those who work to restore or improve the condition of something.
meanings.sent1: The park rehabilitators planted new trees to enhance the greenery.
meanings.sent2: The building rehabilitators renovated the old structure to make it safe.
meanings.sent3: The city rehabilitators organized a fun event to revitalize the community spirit.
meanings.sent4: The garden rehabilitators were like magicians transforming the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated work of the rehabilitators brought new life to the worn-out areas.
